text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump What PERCENTAGE of our population are we testing, Kayleigh? We're way down on that list. There'll be no reopening w/o extensive #TestAndTrace & #TestTraceIsolate like Germany & others have. Better get working on that, #CoronavirusLiar! #WhereAreTheTests  https://t.co/AEZPDyt9XW
